text: Ate tuhade vicom jihare loka samaratha rakhana vale ate sapana hana, uha isa gala di sahu na khana ki uha apane risatedaram ate kagalam ate alaha de raha vica hijarata karana vali'am nu kujha kharaca pani nahi denage. Ate cahida hai ki uha mu'afa kara dena ate chada dena. Ki tusim ate rahimata vala hai
